content: Speak to him, and he’ll complain of the poor meat quality, and instead proclaim that he would rather eat a meatless meal. He’ll ask that you **bring him a Jade Lotus** , which you may already have gathered a lot of by this point. If not, you’ll find Jade Lotus to harvest in most ponds and bodies of water, like the one right at the start of the chapter.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Drunken_Boar_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Drunken Boar Questline', specifically from the subsection 'At the Crouching Tiger Temple'.
The content is as follows:
Speak to him, and he’ll complain of the poor meat quality, and instead proclaim that he would rather eat a meatless meal. He’ll ask that you **bring him a Jade Lotus** , which you may already have gathered a lot of by this point. If not, you’ll find Jade Lotus to harvest in most ponds and bodies of water, like the one right at the start of the chapter.
